The Lopez and David are two guys who share flat in the Eixample district of Barcelona. Years ago, David Lopez was the monitor but this is the only link they have in common as they do not look at anything. When agreed on the visit of the rent, decide to share it because they need each other to get ahead.
Lopez is a failure, with 34 single years, share a flat because of a contract depends on "junk" with Bofarull Radio, where he worked as announcer. David is a young aburgesat one day decides to break with his life and become independent, while still getting paid a week and takes home the assistant, the Carbonell. It has no personality but is convinced that he has talent and looks to the Theatre. In two boys with them Emma, a girl who lives in a wooden hut on the roof of the building but all the services which shares the floor of the boys. There are around the Pole, studying theater and gay companion of David who works as a waiter in Cafe Maurice, Ramon Lopez's partner on the radio and Mercedes, its director.
